history.content: I took it this past fall. It’s hard to say, it really depends on each person. I would say overall it felt slightly easier after going through the lower div CS courses and a couple of upper divs compared to 61B, where I only had 61A under my belt. Also, in terms of pure workload, the homeworks ARE the projects whereas in 61B you have homeworks and projects and labs. So in that sense the workload is lighter, although a couple of homeworks were very time-consuming, especially the last one. I felt that the exams were easier than the 61B exams as well. (I took 61B with Hug if that means anything.) Overall I enjoyed it and would recommend the class to anyone!

children.subject: Highly recommend, very useful class and not very hard (I enjoy classes like 61B and 186). The last project was actually very interesting!

history.content:
What’s the workload and difficulty like for this class? My friend said it’s harder than 61B, is that true? I haven’t programmed in 2 years so I’m debating whether or not to drop it.

thanks
